title: SingingCoach Unlimited
description:
SingingCoach Unlimited

Singing Coach is a revolutionary way for everybody to learn how to sing better! As your pitch improves your confidence will build. As your confidence builds you'll sing better and have more fun!

Singing Coach's animated characters will make learning to use the software and learning to sing easy and fun. It only takes four easy steps, and before you know it, you'll be singing like a star!

Singing Coach's Pitch Tracking Line displays what note you are singing on a musical graph in real time. This helps train your ear to know the exact pitch you are trying to sing.

So the next time you're singing "Happy Birthday" you won't have to just mouth the words, you can belt out the notes and become a birthday Sinatra!

Singing Coach's Compose Mode allows you to compose your own songs by pointing and clicking to enter the melody and lyrics. You can also use the piano keyboard at the bottom of the screen if you prefer to enter pitches that way. If you have the sheet music for one of your favorite songs, you can easily enter the song into Singing Coach.

Compose is simple enough to allow you to easily create short songs, and has the power to let you create quite complex songs and exercises.

Singing Coach's Singing Lessons are an introduction to both Singing Coach and to some basic singing concepts. You will first learn about the basic Singing Coach controls, then about warm-ups for preparing your voice to sing, and techniques for correct singing.

The remaining lessons start with simple exercises and progress to complete songs. You will learn to sing on pitch and see your scores as you practice each exercise.

Singing Coach's Custom Vocal Range displays songs and exercises based on your voice or "vocal range." Your vocal range is the range of notes, from lowest to highest, that you can sing comfortably. In order to display songs and exercises in the best key for you, Singing Coach needs to know what your vocal range is.

You will sing up to a high note, then down to a low note. These notes define your vocal range, and you can see how your vocal range compares to the standard vocal ranges such as Tenor and Alto. Singing Coach will automatically put songs and exercises into your personal vocal range so you can sing comfortably without straining your voice!

Singing Coach's Sheet Music View is a unique graphical display providing a simple and effective method of showing you how you are singing on pitch. Many people are more familiar with sheet music, and Singing Coach allows you to sing songs using Sheet Music View. You will see the familiar staff, time signature, and musical notations.

Singing Coach's Pitch Tracking Line effectively shows you whether you are hitting the notes on pitch. You can even use Sheet Music view to sing the songs you have composed.

> Import MIDI Files
> Tracks Progress for 6 users
> 12 FREE Song Downloads
> Comes with 24 All-Time Practice Songs

Learn to sing any song you want!

SingingCoach Unlimited offers you the ability to get off the sidelines and into the limelight by learning how to sing on pitch and in rhythm. The Unlimited version offers Unlimited songs with the ability to import standard MIDI files. Unlimited Creativity allows you to write your own songs with "click and drag" ease. Unlimited Fun by allowing you to learn to sing all the songs you love.

Windows 2000/ME/XP Required


Official website: http://www.carryatune.com/products.php?prodid=5
